dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Nouveau voyage autour du monde. Tome Premier [bound with Tome II] / Par Guillaume Dampier. -- A Amsterdam : Chez Paul Marret, M.DC.XCVIII (1698). [2],616, [4]p., 6 maps, 7 illus., 15.5 cm.
In French, with title: MAPPE - MONDE. Pag. I. (top right, inside border). Island labeled I. de Californie.
California with two northern indented bays. The S. of Annian is lightly drawn to the north of the island. Shows the track of Dampierâ€™s voyage.
